repairedDockerfile:
# CI test image for unit/lint/type tests
FROM node:12-alpine

RUN apk add --no-cache --update bash

WORKDIR /app

COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

COPY babel.config.js tslint.json lerna.json ./
COPY packages ./packages
COPY bin ./bin
RUN npx lerna bootstrap
RUN npm run build
